meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Todd Lovell Monica Lott Alex Jacob Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7051.

td.p: Todd Lovell, an engineering manager from Carmel, Indiana
Monica Lott, a college English instructor from Rootstown, Ohio
Alex Jacob, a currency trader from Chicago, Illinois (whose 6-day cash winnings total $149,802)

tr.td: (Alex Trebek: In honor of National Park Week, our first category is devoted to...)
NATIONAL PARKS
WHO WANTS TO BE A MILLINER?
FROM PAGE TO SCREEN
A ONE-E & A 2-E
(Alex Trebek: Each correct response will have an "E", and then, later in the word, a double "E".)
THE FIRST PRESIDENT
OBESITY IN AMERICA

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'For the lakes of Voyageurs National Park, you can rent one of these; the original voyageurs had birch bark ones')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: For the lakes of Voyageurs National Park, you can rent one of these; the original voyageurs had birch bark ones

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
